title: [K-12] Online Bible Basics Course: Faith Growth through Remote Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of the basic structure of the Bible and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining online collaboration tools and weekly offline meetings to explore biblical languages and historical contexts in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret basic vocabulary in Biblical Hebrew and Greek with at least 80% proficiency.
Learners can submit weekly biblical text analysis reports in small groups using online collaboration tools.
Learners can produce a 5-minute video presentation explaining the historical and cultural contexts of biblical narratives.

resources: Local center space for offline gatherings

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
